PHRASE.LANG: Guns aren't the only weapon you'll have at your disposal. Bundle includes a top, bottom, and boots. [#Legal]
Vous n'aurez pas que des armes à votre disposition. Le pack contient un haut et un bas de vêtement et des bottes. [#Legal]
Nicht nur Schusswaffen stehen Agentinnen zur Verfügung. Zum Paket gehören Oberteil, Unterteil, und Stiefel. [#Legal]
Le pistole non sono le sole armi a tua disposizione. Il completo include parte superiore, inferiore, e stivali. [#Legal]
Las pistolas no son la única arma a tu disposición. El conjunto comprende torso, pantalones y botas. [#Legal]
총 만이 당신의 무기는 아닙니다. 이 세트는 특수요원 상의, 특수요원 하의, 그리고 특수요원 부츠를 포함합니다. [#Legal]
Guns aren't the only weapon you'll have at your disposal. Bundle includes the Special Agent Top, Special Agent Bottom, and Special Agent Boots. [#Legal]
你可用的武器不僅是槍械。服裝組包括 特派專員服裝-上身、特派專員服裝-下身、特派專員靴。 [#Legal]
你可用的武器不僅是槍械。服裝組包括 特派專員服裝-上半身、特派專員服裝-下半身、特派專員靴。 [#Legal]
Guns aren't the only weapon you'll have at your disposal. Bundle includes a top, bottom, and boots. [#Legal]
